LanguageData.VME_OrganUse_PostMortem.label: post mortem
LanguageData.VME_OrganUse_PostMortem.description:
The organs of one’s being should never go to waste, so long as their vessel is no longer required.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Through the fleshcrafter role can butcher fresh humanoid bodies to acquire fleshcrafted organs.
